name: Crush - Relax Your Brain
description:
Crush is a wildly addicting brain teaser - a simple puzzle game that will challenge you, train your brain and relax at the same time!

It will help you develop logic, and train your mental capacity. The concept is simple: combine puzzle blocks and try to reach the bronze, silver or gold medal using a minimal number of moves!

Play wherever you are, no internet connection needed, just have unlimited fun!
